header.title: Barents Plus scholarship for international students | Sámi University of Applied Sciences

body.p: Barents Plus scholarship for international students

We are now open for applications for regional academic mobility and projects for the academic year 2017-2018 through the Barents Plus scholarship. This scholarship is mainly for Russian Sámi students, attending our Introductory Sámi language in practical situation course– Part I & II or outgoing students from Sámi University of Applied Sciences to russia.
All the necessary forms can be found at the program’s web page www.barentsplus.no
Fill out and send your application to postmottak@samiskhs.no . Mark your e-mail with Barents Plus application. Deadline for this is 15.03.2017.
